Adoption can fail for all kinds of reasons.

sentence.Network_cn: 她提出要让人收养那个婴儿。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Latin adoptio(n-), from ad- 'to' + optio(n-) 'choosing' (see option)

entry.def: If you adopt a new attitude, plan, or way of behaving, you begin to have it.

example.ex: Parliament adopted a resolution calling for the complete withdrawal of troops...
example.tran: 议会采纳了要求全部撤军的决议。

example.ex: Pupils should be helped to adopt a positive approach to the environment.
example.tran: 应帮助学生对环境采取积极的态度。

entry.def: If you adopt someone else's child, you take it into your own family and make it legally your son or daughter.

example.ex: There are hundreds of people desperate to adopt a child...
example.tran: 有数以百计的人渴望领养孩子。

example.ex: The adopted child has the right to see his birth certificate.
example.tran: 被收养的孩子有权看自己的出生证明。

entry.def: If you adopt a physical position, you move yourself into it.

example.ex: I tried to adopt a curled-up position to avoid damaging my limbs.
example.tran: 我努力保持蜷曲的姿势以免四肢受伤。

entry.tran: 移居（某国）;选择（某国）定居
entry.def: If you adopt a country, you choose it as a place to live.

example.ex: Podulski had joined the U.S. Navy as an aviator, adopting a new country and a new profession.
example.tran: 波度尔斯基加入美国海军当上了飞行员，不仅改了国籍还换了行当。

entry.def: If you adopt an accent or a particular tone of voice, you speak differently from normal, especially to create an effect in a particular situation.

example.ex: He has adopted the accent of a Second World War newscaster...
example.tran: 他承袭了二战时期播音员的口音。

example.ex: The girl was uncertain what to do, or what tone of voice to adopt.
example.tran: 女孩不知道该做什么，也不知道该用什么口气说。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of accepting with approval; favorable reception;

2. a legal proceeding that creates a parent-child relation between persons not related by blood; the adopted child is entitled to all privileges belonging to a natural child of the adoptive parents (including the right to inherit)
3. the appropriation (of ideas or words etc) from another source;

sentences.sentence: "the borrowing of ancient motifs was very apparent"

Sentence.sentence: Necessity will force the swift adoption of more efficient ones.
